column123: All players call to 100. No raises. Simple pot split between 3 players.
column124: Total pot = 300 | Main pot = 300 | No side pots | All 3 players eligible | No dead money | Each contributed 100

Max Win - P3: UTG raises to 300. All players call. Simple 4-way pot.
Max Win - P4: Total pot = 1200 | Each player contributed 300 | BB blind counted toward contribution | SB blind counted toward contribution
Charlie folds preflop. Alice calls SB. Bob checks BB.
Max Win - P5: Charlie excluded (folded) | Charlie stack unchanged | Only Alice and Bob can win

Max Win - P4: Alice posts SB then folds. SB blind becomes dead money.
Max Win - P5: Dead money = 50 | Alice lost blind | Bob and Charlie eligible

Scenario Description: One Short Stack All-In - Others Call
Max Win - P4: Charlie short stack goes all-in for 500. Alice and Bob both call. No side pot created because everyone contributed equally.
Max Win - P5: Charlie all-in | All players contributed 500 | No side pot (everyone equal) | Charlie stack = 0

Max Win - P3: Charlie all-in 300. Alice raises to 600. Bob calls 600. Creates main pot (3x300=900) and side pot (2x300=600).
Max Win - P4: Main pot = 900 (3 players) | Side pot = 600 (Alice & Bob only) | Charlie excluded from side pot | Charlie can only win 900 max

Max Win - P2: Alice folds after posting blind. David all-in for 250. Creates 2 pots.
Max Win - P3: Alice's blind is dead money | Main pot capped at 250 | Side pot for additional 250 from Bob/Charlie

Max Win - P4: Two all-ins: Charlie at 500 and Bob at 2000. Creates main pot + 1 side pot.
Max Win - P5: Main pot = 2000 (4x500) | Side pot 1 = 4500 (3x1500) | Charlie can win 2000 max | Bob can win 6500 max

Max Win - P3: Three all-ins at different amounts: 300 / 800 / 1500. Creates 3 pots.
Max Win - P4: Main pot = 1500 (5x300) | Side 1 = 2000 (4x500) | Side 2 = 2100 (3x700) | Charlie max win 1500 | David max win 3500 | Others max 5600
BB posts 25 ante (dead money) + 100 blind. Ante is dead and not part of BB's live contribution.
Max Win - P5: Dead money = 25 (ante) | BB contributed 100 live (blind only) | Players match 100 not 125 | BB lost 125 total (100 blind + 25 ante)

Max Win - P3: Everyone folds to Charlie's raise. Charlie wins the blinds without resistance.
Max Win - P4: Dead money = 150 (both blinds) | Charlie wins without contributing | Only Alice and Bob lost money | Charlie +50 net

Notes: Charlie raises to 300. Alice re-raises to 800. Both Charlie and Bob fold. Alice wins.
Verification Checklist: Dead money = 400 total | Folded blinds = 100 (Bob) | Folded bets = 300 (Charlie) | Alice's 800 raise uncalled (returned)

Scenario Description: Preflop to Flop - Pot Carries Forward
column124: Preflop: 3 players call to 300 (pot = 900). Flop: Alice folds. Bob bets 500. Charlie calls. Pot accumulates across streets.
column125: Preflop pot = 900 | Flop adds 1000 (500+500) | Total pot = 1900 | Alice's 300 preflop contribution stays in pot (dead) | Only Bob and Charlie can win

column134: Bob all-in preflop for 5000. Alice and Charlie continue betting through river. Main pot frozen at 15000. Side pot grows to 16000.
column135: Main pot = 15000 (3x5000) frozen | Side pot accumulates: Flop +4000 Turn +12000 = 16000 total | Bob can only win 15000 | Alice/Charlie can win full 31000

column128: Preflop: Charlie all-in 2000. Flop: David all-in (total 5000). Turn: Alice and Bob bet 5000 more each. Three pots created.
column129: Pot 0 = 8000 (4x2000) | Pot 1 = 9000 (3x3000) | Pot 2 = 10000 (2x5000) | Charlie max 8000 | David max 17000 | Alice/Bob max 27000

Max Win - P4: Charlie folds. Alice folds. Bob wins blinds without challenge.
Max Win - P5: BB gets own blind back | BB wins only SB blind (50) | BB net +50 | Alice loses 50

Scenario Description: All-In for Less Than Big Blind
Max Win - P3: Charlie all-in for 75 (less than BB of 100). Standard rules: action continues to BB. Creates small main pot + side pot.
Max Win - P4: Main pot = 225 (3x75) | Side pot = 50 (2x25) | Charlie can only win 225 | Alice/Bob can win full 275

column129: Charlie all-in preflop. Alice and Bob check through all streets. No side pot created despite all-in situation.
column130: No side pot (no additional betting) | All 3 players eligible for same pot | Checking doesn't create side action

Max Win - P5: Tournament final table. 5 players. 100 ante each. Multiple all-ins. Complex pot with antes and dead money.
Notes: 5 antes = 500 (all dead) | Alice folded (600 dead) | David folded (100 dead) | Main pot = 11200 includes 1100 dead | Side pot = 17000 (Bob/Emma only) | Charlie max 11200 | Bob/Emma max 28200

column135: Deep stack cash game. Complex multi-street action. Emma all-in flop for 18000. Charlie all-in flop for 25000. Frank's 30000 raise partially uncalled (5000 returned).
column136: Preflop pot = 8700 | Flop: Emma all-in 18K Charlie all-in 25K Frank raises 30K | Uncalled 5K returned to Frank | Main pot = 54300 (3x18000 + 300 dead) | Side pot = 14000 (2x7000) | Emma max 54300 | Charlie/Frank max 68300
